{{Description|A common avian species in Teyvat. Plump and meaty, but can also be trained to deliver messages.<br />An ordinary pigeon that takes its name from its glaze-like glossy neck. Because it is such a common sight, few take much note of its gorgeous plumage.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Brightcrown Pigeon''' is a type of pigeon which can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=299 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found near the crafting bench and near the harbour (east) of [[Liyue Harbor]].
